message: When families leave their home because of violence, they cannot take with them many of their personal belongings. Sometimes they relocate themselves through their own means, sometimes it is necessary to go to a shelter. What is like to live in this reality through the eyes of a child?

colorSteps.title: Color steps
colorSteps.description: “These are my shoes, the ones I use every day to play in my house”.
colorSteps.author: Dani, 9 years old.

tastySoup.title: Tasty soup
tastySoup.description: “This is my mom’s cooking pot where she makes chicken soup… she makes it so tasty”.
tastySoup.author: José, 14 years old.

eggsForBreakfast.title: Eggs for breakfast
eggsForBreakfast.description: “My mom makes egg sandwiches for breakfast; she makes them with sauce, eggs, cheese and bread”.
eggsForBreakfast.author: Flor, ten years old.

newLives.title: New lives
newLives.description: “My mom and I started sowing the seeds of a papaya that was sweet and it worked”.
newLives.author: Alberto, 15 years old.

homeGeometry.title: Home geometry
homeGeometry.description: “This is the door of the house where we live, we keep it closed most of the time”.
homeGeometry.author: Carlos, 13 years old.

visibleLimits.title: Visible limits
visibleLimits.description: “In the space where we are there is just room for a bunk bed and a closet, we all sleep on the bunk bed, my mom, my dad, my sister and I; there is not much room”.
visibleLimits.author: Alex, 14 years old.

BaluTheDog.title: Balu the dog
BaluTheDog.description: “My grandmother gave it to me, he has many colors because he is happy”.
BaluTheDog.author: Valeria, 12 years old.

KatiCat.title: Kati Cat
KatiCat.description: “This is my favorite stuffed animal; I like cats, he sleeps with me”.
KatiCat.author: Karla, 9 years old.

oralDiscipline.title: Oral discipline
oralDiscipline.description: “My dad always tells us to brush our teeth at night”.
oralDiscipline.author: Jonathan, 11 years old.

frozenFruits.title: Frozen fruits
frozenFruits.description: “Sometimes in the afternoon we take out the frozen fruits from the fridge and we eat it like that, we like frozen fruit”.
frozenFruits.author: Camila, 13 years old.
